content.text: Release history for Nightjar. Each release includes the version number, release date, and summary of changes. For full details, visit the GitHub Releases page.
This page loads the latest releases automatically from the GitHub API. If releases don't appear, check your internet connection or visit github.com/NiyaNagi/Nightjar/releases directly.
v1.8.9 â€” Share Link Race Fix & File Download Retry (Issue #18)

Two user-facing bugs persisted after v1.8.7: clicking a share link while an identity was locked or being selected silently lost the link, and file downloads failed immediately with 'Connected peers: 0' instead of retrying. This release fixes both bugs, adds automatic workspace switching when re-joining an existing workspace via share link, and makes file downloads resilient with retry + re-bootstrap.

Fix: Identity selection now processes pending share links (handleIdentitySelected wired to processPendingShareLink)

Fix: File download retry with exponential backoff (2s â†’ 4s â†’ 8s, up to 3 retries per chunk)
Fix: One-shot re-bootstrap when 0 peers connected in FileTransferContext
